name: PDF experiments
description: Take a deeper look into how a PDF file is structured, and learn about the pro / const of the file format. As part of this talk, we will look at the PDF and TTF specification and a (unfinished) PDF compiler (=a program that creates PDFs). At the end of this talk, you can create a minimal PDF from scratch in a text editor.

name: web
description: This is a crash course to HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP; we'll learn some design / user experience on the way. You need no prior knowledge, and need not to be a programmer! After this course, you will be able to create your own simple webpage.
